hadith.text: It was narrated that Muhmmad bin Abi Abkr - Ath-Thaqafi - said:"I said to Anas on the morning of Arafat: 'What do you say about the Talbiyah on this day?' I said: 'I walked this path with the Messenger of Allah and his Companions. Some of them recited the Talbiyah and some recited the Takbir, and none of them denounced any other
